name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
AI Engineer with 10+ years of experience in developing and deploying scalable solutions using cutting-edge technologies. Proficient in **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **React**, with a deep understanding of **APIs** for seamless integration and **AWS** for cloud services. Skilled in LLM Production, **OCR**, image processing, and creating document pipelines that optimize workflows and enhance data retrieval. Demonstrated expertise in orchestration frameworks for streamlining processes and driving efficiency. Passionate about integrating AI capabilities to build intelligent systems that leverage real-time analytics, automation, and machine learning, while ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
